root.name: Space Football: One on One
root.description: OverviewSpace Football: One on One is a futuristic sport in which two spaceships fight over a sphere, with the desire to bring the sphere (or 'space football') to the goal to score what is presumably a 'space touchdown'. The playing field is split into halves, and is filled with obstacles, including bumpers (similar in style to pinball) and arrows that force your spaceship in a particular direction. Games last five minutes.A spaceship can shoot projectiles at the opponent, but doing so is rather ineffective.
